mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_AUTH_INFO (AUTH_TRANSACTION_ID, PARTITION_ID, CTN, VERSION, CORRELATION_ID, PURCHASE_TIME, BILLING_AGREEMENT, OPERATOR_USER_TOKEN, PAYMENT_DESCRIPTION, MERCHANT_NAME, ITEM_NAME, MERCHANT_CONTACT, ITEM_PRICE, TAX, TOTAL, USER_LOCALE, DCB_TOS_VERSION, RESULT, CANCEL_NOTIFICATION, CANCEL_NOTIFICATION_DT, SUB_NO, ACE_NO, BAN, UNIT_MDL, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TRANSACTION_DT, TRANSACTION_RESULT, PAYMENT_TYPE, REFUND_DT, CREATE_DT, FEE_TYPE, CURRENCY, UPDATE_DT, CUST_GRD_CD, ADJ_INFO, BAN_UNPAID_YN_CODE, MP_TRANSACTION_ID, MP_TRANSACTION_TYPE) VALUES (#{authTransactionId}, #{partitionId}, #{ctn}, #{version}, #{correlationId}, #{purchaseTime}, #{billingAgreement}, #{operatorUserToken}, #{paymentDescription}, #{merchantName}, #{itemName}, #{merchantContact}, #{itemPrice}, #{tax}, #{total}, #{userLocale}, #{dcbTosVersion}, #{result}, #{cancelNotification}, #{cancelNotificationDt}, #{subNo}, #{aceNo}, #{ban}, #{unitMdl}, #{transactionType}, #{transactionDt}, #{transactionResult}, #{paymentType}, #{refundDt}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{feeType}, #{currency}, #{updateDt}, #{custGrdCd}, #{adjInfo}, #{banUnpaidYnCode}, #{mpTransactionId}, #{mpTransactionType})

INSERT INTO TB_MANUAL_REFUND_FILE_INFO (REQUEST_NAME, RESPONSE_NAME, RETRY, UPDATE_DT, CREATE_DT) VALUES (#{requestName}, #{responseName}, #{retry}, #{updateDt}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
